snippet.title: Flat Kingdom Trailer 1.
snippet.description:
This is Flat Kingdom, a wonderful new 2D platform game soon to be released for PC and Mac in Steam.

You can change your shape any time you want in order to gain different abilities and fight with different strategies!

You have three basic shapes: a circle, a triangle and a square. Each is very unique and offer a very different play style. With these, you can overcome obstacles or solve puzzles.

Enemies have shapes too, so you’ll have to think carefully before approaching them!
